name: Disc Golf Manager
author: Grayson Robbins

sections.description:
The Disc Golf Manager plugin allows tournament directors and promoters of the sport to completely manage and display disc golf events. Say good-bye to spreadsheets, pdf uploads, clipboards, and calculation errors. DGM does it all, quickly and efficiently. Tournament directors and players alike will enjoys it’s features. Additional add-ons are available for points series and leagues. See MSDiscgolf for complete details!

Features

  • Supports up to five round tournaments
  • Unlimited events
  • Unlimited players
  • Shortcodes to display data on any page or post
  • Online scoring of events
  • Player info is retained in database
  • Player performance statistics

Future possibilities

  • Online event registration
  • Handicapped events
  • Player rankings

Disc Golf Manager Extensions

Additional features for points series and leagues are available as separate add-on plugins on the plugin website.

Shortcodes

[disc_golf_event] … lists all events
[disc_golf_future_events] … lists only upcoming events
[disc_golf_overview] … display event results
[disc_golf_players] … display of all players

Active Site

Tupelo Disc Golf
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/Disc_Golf_Manager directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Set up seasons, events, and players through WP dashboard
  4. In Disc Golf Manager settings, define shortcode page locations
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/Disc_Golf_Manager directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Set up seasons, events, and players through WP dashboard
  4. In Disc Golf Manager settings, define shortcode page locations

How are points allocated?

Points are configurable when creating “Seasons”. The administrator can set points for the following: Participation, Player within division beaten, and Divisional wins!

Are division configurable?

Normal divisions are set by default. They are editable via the administrator. Want to offer “Mixed Doubles”? No problem!

What user roles are available?

The plugin generates a custom role of “Tournament Director” who has the ability of log in the WordPress dashboard and manage their events, The WP admin has full permissions.

Do players need to register?

No. Besides the administrator, only tournament directors register with the system

Is there a limit for players?

No. The system will manage as large events or small

Is there a limit for events?

No. The system was designed to manage all events. Weekly minis, special club events, or regional tournaments. There is no limit.

Are results editable in case of error?

Of course. The admin may edit all while Tournament directors can only edit their events.

Does the plugin handle Doubles tournament?

Yes, and points are allocated to the division played.

What features are in the premium add-ons?

The Points addon allows players to gather points for participation, performance, and wins. The League add-on includes Points, plus allows events to be tied together to offer smaller points races, or leagues.

short_description: A tournament management system for advertising, scoring, and displaying disc golf tournaments!

upgrade_notice: The current version of Disc Golf Manager is the initial version. Please contact if you encounter problems.
